title: Broadway, broadway, broadway
author: Author not listed
l: Oh how I love it so.

br.l: Like Katy Perry and that one guy.
And while I watch I will eat,
It's yum yum good to me.
Yum yum pops, pizza and candy,
A suit or a business tie?
Or even a funny hat that says "Tires" on it.
I will have a good time.
